property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are not The Godfather, cannot be packed when packing Sidewalk Slam. property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, this card is -5F, +5D, and when you have at least 5 lower Fortitude, can only be reversed from Backlash or Arsenal. As a reversal, reverse any Throwback card. When successfully played, he overturns cards equal to the number of non-Pre-match Throwback cards in his Ring and he discards 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed by Test. When you search your Arsenal for any reason, you may reveal this card from your Arsenal and put it into your Ringside. You may play this card from your Ringside. When played from your Ringside, your opponent may remove 1 non-Unique non-Backlash non-maneuver card in your Ring from the game. When this card is in your Ringside, your non-Chain Cheater cards are -3F and he cannot move this card from your Ringside to any other location.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Before playing this card, when your opponent is Mr. Pay-Per-View, ignore his Ability. When this card is overturned, reverse any non-damage card effect (even during the Pre-match phase) and put up to 2 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: This card is +3F for each Unique reversal in your Ring. Reverse any maneuver and draw 1 card. When this card is in your Ring and you successfully play a BASH maneuver, you may put this card on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-Unique non-hybrid maneuver; when Once a Horseman, Always a Horseman is in your Ring, this card is -4F and reverse any non-hybrid maneuver instead, then put up to 4 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are Goldberg or a WCW Superstar, this card is F: 0 and cannot be reversed. Discard 1 card, shuffle 5 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal, and your next card played this turn cannot be reversed. Your The King Interferes! is -15F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your BASH maneuver is unsuccessful, search your Arsenal for up to # BASH maneuvers with different titles (where # is equal to 2 minus the number of reversals played to that card), reveal them, put them in your hand, and shuffle. property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed when packing In The Interest Of Fairness, or when you are The Heat Seekers. Your opponent's Starting Hand Size is -1. property.name: Card Text

Before your Draw Segment when your Ability is blank, choose one: draw 1 card if you have less than 10 cards in hand, or put up to 1 card from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: During the Pre-match phase, no player may move cards from his opponent's hand, Backlash, or Ring with non-Superstar-specific cards; reduce his opponent's Starting Hand Size or Pre-match Capacity; or force his opponent to overturn cards. After all Pre-match phases, put # random cards from your hand on the bottom of your Arsenal, where # is equal to twice the number of Pre-match slots you have filled above 5.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed when packing All Together Now. Your opponent's I'm Gonna Break You is blank. Choose a number from 0 to 10, overturn the chosen number of cards. At the end of the Pre-match phase if you resolve your effects first, you may instead resolve 1 Pyrotechnic Volley after all Pre-match have been resolved. card.name: Hold On! Its Not Time to Show Yet!

property.name: Card Text
